abstract: Mark Zuckerberg, the Facebook co-founder, and Carl C. Icahn are two of the latest billionaires who have signed a pledge to give at least half of their wealth to charity.
snippet: Mark Zuckerberg, the Facebook co-founder, and Carl C. Icahn are two of the latest billionaires who have signed a pledge to give at least half of their wealth to charity.
lead_paragraph: 12:55 p.m. | Updated Mark Zuckerberg, the co-founder of Facebook, may be the world’s youngest billionaire. But he’s already pledging to give away most of his wealth.

headline.main: Zuckerberg and Icahn Join Buffett and Gates on Giving Pledge List

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
